{{cpp/title|swap{{small|(std::match_results)}}}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=regex|since=c++11|
template&lt; class BidirIt, class Alloc &gt;
void swap( match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; x1,
           match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; x2 ) noexcept;
}}

Specializes the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::match_results}}. Exchanges the contents of {{c|x1}} with those of {{c|x2}}. Effectively calls {{c|x1.swap(x2)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x1, x2|the match_results objects whose contents will be swapped}}
{{par hreq}}
{{par req named|BidirIt|BidirectionalIterator}}
{{par req named|Alloc|Allocator}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
